Package clinic.src.project.util

Class Date

java.lang.Object
clinic.src.project.util.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
This class represents the date of either the appointment or the patient profile's date of birth.

    • Date

      public Date()
      Default Constructor to set the date to invalid.

    • Date

      public Date(String dateStr)
      Parameterized Constructor to handle if the argument is in a String argument instead of three integers.
      Parameters:
      dateStr - the date being sent in String data type.

    • Date

      public Date(Date copyDate)
      Copy Constructor to copy the Date from an existing Date.
      Parameters:
      copyDate - the Date being passed.

    • Date

      public Date(int year, int month, int day)
      Parameter Constructor to create a Date.
      Parameters:
      year - the year of the appointment or patient's date of birth.
      month - the month of the appointment or patient's date of birth.
      day - the day of the appointment or the patient's date of birth.

      Check if date is a future date.
      Returns:
      true if date is a future date, false otherwise.

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid()
      Determine if the date is a valid calendar date.
      Returns:
      True if calendar date, false is not a valid calendar date.

    • isToday

      public boolean isToday()
      Check if the date is today's actual calendar date.
      Returns:
      true if date is today, false otherwise.

    • isDayBeforeToday

      public boolean isDayBeforeToday()
      Check if the date is the day before today's actual calendar date.
      Returns:
      true if day before today, false otherwise.

    • isWeekend

      public boolean isWeekend()
      Check if date is a weekend date.
      Returns:
      true if date is weekend, false otherwise.

    • isNotWithinSixMonthsFromToday

      public boolean isNotWithinSixMonthsFromToday()
      Check is date is NOT within six months from today.
      Returns:
      true if not within six months from today, false otherwise.

    • realDOB

      public boolean realDOB()
      Check if the date of birth is a real date.
      Returns:
      true if real date of birth, false otherwise.

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date date)
      Compare date.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      date - the date to be compared.
      Returns:
      -1 if date is before, 0 if same, 1 if after.
